Make reference Table

Source: R/utils.R
make_reference.Rd

Makes the reference table used my many functions in this package. This is part of the basic setup.

make_reference(connection)

Arguments

connection

a database connection

Value

a tibble with episode level data with site

Examples

db_pth <- system.file("testdata/synthetic_db.sqlite3", package = "inspectEHR")
ctn <- connect(sqlite_file = db_pth)
ref <- make_reference(ctn)
head(ref)
#> # A tibble: 6 x 4
#>   episode_id nhs_number start_date          site 
#>        <int> <chr>      <dttm>              <chr>
#> 1      13626 8674351972 2016-02-19 01:28:00 B    
#> 2      13639 4295442348 2016-02-18 17:36:04 B    
#> 3      13640 3369135825 2016-02-18 20:21:47 B    
#> 4      13641 5222379698 2016-02-18 18:23:56 B    
#> 5      13642 4463215420 2016-02-18 09:19:18 B    
#> 6      13643 7366572217 2016-02-18 21:07:40 B    
DBI::dbDisconnect(ctn)
